view

Interface ITableDialog

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TableDialog

    public interface ITableDialog
    Author:
    Giacomo Scaparrotti An interface modelling a table dialog. A table dialog is a dialog window which shows all the orders of a certain table, and allows you to add new ones, choosing from a provided IMenu.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOrderToView(java.lang.String name, double price, int amount, int processed) 
      void billUpdate(double bill, double effectiveBill) 
      void clearErrors()
      Clear all the error previously shown with the showError(Exception) method.
      void clearTab()
      Erases all the entries from the tab containing all the orders.
      void setControllerAndBuildView(IDialogController dialogCtrl) 
      void showError(java.lang.Exception e) 
      void showMessage(java.lang.String message) 

    • Method Detail

      • addOrderToView

        void addOrderToView(java.lang.String name,
                    double price,
                    int amount,
                    int processed)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the dish you want to add to the dialog
        price - The price of the dish you want to add to the dialog
        amount - The amount of dishes to add
        processed - The amount of already processed dishes Adds the given order to the dialog. You have to specify a name, a cost, a total amount and the amount of already processed dishes, which is the amount of already served dishes of this kind.

      • billUpdate

        void billUpdate(double bill,
                double effectiveBill)
        Parameters:
        bill - The total bill of this table
        effectiveBill - The cost of the already served dishes Updates the bill of the table

      • clearTab

        void clearTab()
        Erases all the entries from the tab containing all the orders.

      • showError

        void showError(java.lang.Exception e)
        Parameters:
        e - An exception thrown somewhere in the code while computing something related to this dialog Shows the message of the given exception

      • showMessage

        void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        message - A String you want to show Shows a generic message

      • clearErrors

        void clearErrors()
        Clear all the error previously shown with the showError(Exception) method.

      • setControllerAndBuildView

        void setControllerAndBuildView(IDialogController dialogCtrl)
        Parameters:
        dialogCtrl - the IDialogController which will control this dialog Sets the given IDialogController as this dialog's controller, then builds the entire dialog window.
